alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 12:18AM EDT until May 14 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Michigamme River near Witch Lake affecting Dickinson and Marquette Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Michigamme River near Witch Lake. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water impacts the yards and a few homes near Bengtson bridge on County Road LI in South Republic and along Floodwood Drive near the Michigamme River east of M-95. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:10 PM CDT Saturday /12:10 AM EDT Sunday/ the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river stage is expected to remain steady at 9.0 feet tonight before falling below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.3 feet on 05/13/2014. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Sunday morning at 1100 AM CDT /1200 PM EDT/.
